article.name: I’ve set up mackerel-container-agent in an Amazon ECS environment, but the host won’t integrate with Mackerel
article.title: I’ve set up mackerel-container-agent in an Amazon ECS environment, but the host won’t integrate with Mackerel
article.body:
Please review and confirm the following.

  • Make sure that the operating conditions described in this help page are met.
  • If you’ve set up a Readiness Probe, make sure that it can be checked normally.
  • If you would like to monitor an ECS cluster, please use AWS Integration.

If you’re experiencing abnormal connectivity alerts, confirm the following.

  • Make sure you’re using the latest version of mackerel-container-agent.
  • If the problem still hasn’t been resolved, please contact our support team.

If the configuration file deployed in S3 cannot be read normally, confirm the following.

  • Make sure that the IAM role for the ECS task has access permission for S3.
